context.p: On the Change temporary password page, you must change the temporary password you have received for your first login.

step.cmd: Enter the current (temporary) password and the new password, and repeat the new password.

info.p: The minimum password length is 6 characters, the maximum length is 100 characters.

step.cmd: To save the new password, click Change.

result.p: The new password is saved. Use it when logging in again.
